rdf:Description.rdfs:label: BeachInd
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: You can find the most beautiful and pleasant places at the best prices with special discounts, you choose the place we will guide you all the way to wait, get your place now.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Bali
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Bali is a province in Indonesia whose capital city is Denpasar. Bali is also one of the islands in the Nusa Tenggara Archipelago.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Aceh
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Aceh is a province in Indonesia whose capital is Banda Aceh. Aceh is located at the northern tip of the island of Sumatra and is the westernmost province in Indonesia.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Nusa Tenggara Barat
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: West Nusa Tenggara is a province in Indonesia located in the western part of the Nusa Tenggara Islands. The capital of this province is in the city of Mataram.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Jawa Timur
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: East Java is a province in the eastern part of Java Island, Indonesia. The capital city of East Java is the city of Surabaya.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Papua
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Papua is a province located in the central part of the island of Papua or the easternmost part of the Indonesian territory of Papua.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Yogyakarta
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The Special Region of Yogyakarta is a Special Region at the provincial level in Indonesia which is the fusion of the Sultanate of Yogyakarta and the Duchy of Paku Alaman.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Pink Beach
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Pink Beach or Tangsi Beach is one of two beaches in Indonesia that has pink or pink sand.
rdf:Description.dbp:address: Desa Serokah, Kecamatan Jerowaru, Kabupaten Lombok Timur
rdf:Description.dbr:Tourist_attraction: Pink beach sand, the beauty of the sunset, awesome underwater scenery

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Gili Trawangan
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Gili Trawangan Beach has clear blue water and bright blue gradations on the white sandy beach.
rdf:Description.dbp:address: Desa Gili Indah, Pemenang, Kabupaten Lombok Utara
rdf:Description.dbr:Tourist_attraction: Charming Beach, exotic underwater ecosystem, turtle hatchery

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Nusa Dua Beach
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nusa Dua Beach is one of the famous beaches in Bali for its cleanliness and beauty.
rdf:Description.dbp:address: Kawasan BTDC Area, Jalan Nusa Dua, Benoa, Kecamatan Kuta Selatan, Kabupaten Badung
rdf:Description.dbr:Tourist_attraction: A safe, clean beach, away from the crowds, relax on the beach, ride a horse along the shoreline

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Seminyak Beach
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Seminyak Beach or Dhynapura Beach is synonymous with soft white sand and a favorite place for surfers.
rdf:Description.dbp:address: Jl. Dhyana Pura No.99, Seminyak, Kuta, Badung Regency
rdf:Description.dbr:Tourist_attraction: Enjoy the panoramic view of the beach, surfing with the waves, sunbathe and relax by the beach

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Banyu Tibo Beach
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Banyu Tibo Beach is a beach area that has a turquoise sea color and has a waterfall.
rdf:Description.dbp:address: Desa Widoro, Kecamatan Donorejo, Kabupaten Pacitan
rdf:Description.dbr:Tourist_attraction: - A waterfall that directly falls to the beach, urrounded by rocky hills, surf

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Iboih Beach
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Iboih Beach Sabang is one of the popular marine tourism destinations and the main tourist attractions in Sabang Pulau Weh.
rdf:Description.dbp:address: Pulau Weh, kota Sabang, Aceh Utara
rdf:Description.dbr:Tourist_attraction: Scuba diving, snorkeling in the Marine Park, walk from Tepin Layeu to Yulia Bungalow
